September 2016 was the hottest on record, making it 11th of the last 12 months to hold that record, says Nasa
Saudi prince executed for murder.Saudi Arabia has executed a member of the royal family for murder, in a rare case involving one of the thousands of members of the House of Saud.

Silent poison making whaling a political hot potato in the Faroe Islands: Whale meat and blubber has long been a staple of the Faroese diet, but with pilot whales increasingly contaminated by toxic substances, this traditional food source is silently poisoning the local population.
